price: De ki: O’na (şirk koşmada) kattığınız ortakları bana gösterin. Asla gösteremezsiniz. Çok güçlü ve hakim olan, O Allah’tır.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul arūniya alladhīna alḥaqtum bihi shurakāa kallā bal huwa al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
